Regressed: https://oss-fuzz.com/revisions?job=libfuzzer_ubsan_libxml2&range=201705081857:201705091638

Issue filed automatically.

See https://github.com/google/oss-fuzz/blob/master/docs/reproducing.md for more information.

This bug is subject to a 90 day disclosure deadline. If 90 days elapse
without an upstream patch, then the bug report will automatically
become visible to the public.

This issue will be fixed by resolving this upstream bug:

Bug 766828 - xmlParseStartTag2() contains typo when checking for default definitions for an attribute in a namespace
<https://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=766828>

The problem here is a sloppy definition of a two-dimensional array.  Fixing the definition of the 2D array (and cleaning up the code that uses it) fixes this UBSan warning.

The UBSan error is fixed here:

https://git.gnome.org/browse/libxml2/commit/?id=474967241cdcce6d3a2fd356079571eee794ec12

ClusterFuzz has detected this issue as fixed in range 201705312014:201706011641.
